description: Our team continues to work remotely due to COVID-19. Each of us has our own personalized home workspace where we can focus. Here is a peek at the workspaces of a designer, a Helpdesk support member, and an account manager.
Since our pugs are stuck at home sheltering in place, they wanted to introduce you to their work pal's pups! Meet Alejandra’s dog Kiwi, who is a wonderful reading pal :)
